author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Facebook video calls soar 1000% during Italy's lockdown
description: The social media platform has seen usage rocket in countries hardest hit by coronavirus lockdowns.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Facebook has seen usage across its platforms surge in countries that have brought in virus lockdowns.
Italy - with some of the toughest restrictions - has seen the biggest rise, with group video calls rocketing by more than 1000%… [+1601 chars]
